submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumDifference(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        bit = nums[0]
        ans = abs(k - bit)
        s = set([nums[0]])
        for i in nums[1:]:
            ans = min(ans, abs(k-i))
            n_s = set()
            n_s.add(i)
            for j in s:
                n_bit = j&i
                ans = min(ans, abs(k-n_bit))
                n_s.add(n_bit)
            s = n_s
        return ans
